sentences:
Patmos ( , ) is a small Greek island in the Aegean Sea , most famous for being the location of the vision given to the disciple John in the Book of Revelation in the New Testament , and where the book was written .
One of the northernmost islands of the Dodecanese complex , it has a population of 2,998 and an area of .
The highest point is Profitis Ilias , above sea level .
The municipality of Patmos , which includes the offshore islands of Arkoi ( pop .
44 ) , Marathos ( pop .
5 ) , and several uninhabited islets , has a total population of 3,047 ( 2011 census ) and a combined land area of .
It is part of the Kalymnos regional unit .
Patmos ' main communities are Chora ( the capital city ) , and Skala , the only commercial port .
Other settlements are Grikou and Kampos .
The churches and communities on Patmos are of the Eastern Orthodox tradition .
The mayor of Patmos is Gregory Stoikos .
